item.description:
Ladies, it's back! We’ll begin class with a fun cardio dance warm-up that includes some belly dance, Latin dance and hip hop. Next, exercises are incorporated to tone, tighten and build lean muscle. We’ll finish up really breaking a sweat by learning and rehearsing a flir...ty and seductive cardio dance to blast calories!
You’ll leave class feeling SEXY and CONFIDENT!

Summer classes will be held Monday nights at 6:30
$7/class or get a $60/ten pack! (10 packs can also be used for bootcamp)
**Pre-registration required at www.bridgetsdancestudio.com**

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Strip Fit
